text: Era jjukira Mukama omulabiriziwo bwe yajja ku migongo gy’abaana ba Adam ezzadde lyabwe, n’abalagira beeweeko obujulizi, (naagamba nti) Sinze Mukama omulabirizi wa mmwe, nebagamba nti, bwe guli, era tukiwaako obujulizi, olwo nno muleme kugamba ku lunaku lw'enkomerero nti, mazima ddala ffe, kino twali tetukimanyi
